Articles.Content:
Another classic design from my youth.

Couldn't bother to build a launcher for it. And I think it would be unwise to do so. Launch into space using Hyperedit.

Yes, it's all stock. The green "sphere" at the rear is the result of visual trickery.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

download link: http://kerbalx.com/Azimech/Blakes-7---Liberator

Thats great! +rep for you :-)

I can just see all the kids going "What the hell is Blake's Seven?"

Nicely done Azimech, +1

The Liberator is one of my all time favourite sci-fi ships.

I had a crack at making one in KSP, back before I really understood how the game worked - so my version was totally wobbly, and had the Delta-V of a dead cow.

I still have a screenshot of it.

Unlike you, I never found a way to represent the globe!
